name: Bob Escapes The Planet
description:
An endless running game featuring Bob the cute alien. Help him escape the mysterious planet!

Objectives

  •  Try to get as far as you can while avoiding the pits
  •  Collect coins along the way, for no good reason really...

Controls

  • Press Any Key or Mouse Button to Jump - easy!

Developer Update - March 10, 2019

  • Buttons on Game Over screen now work
  • High score is now remembered

Disclaimer:

This is my first ever game so still have a few rough edges to iron out so apologies if it's buggy! Will be adding more polish over the coming days. 

Built using Unity Engine 2018 Free Edition.
